wikipedia_page.main: Ezer Griffiths OBE, FRS (27 November 1888 – 14 February 1962) was a Welsh physicist most noted for his work on the insulation properties of metals, heat transference, evaporation and refrigeration.

response: **Physicist Ezer Griffiths is awarded the O.B.E.
